My Methodology

All of my UI/UX and designs are based off the clients' needs and wants.

1

Discuss The Project

The most critical step. Both parties must establish a firm understanding of the projects scope.

2

Brainstorm Ideas

Many ideas will be discussed and designed until the client is confident in moving foward.

3

UI/UX Planning

Designs will be presented until the client feels completely satisfied.

4

Execution

Progress updates will be provided in two week intervals. Changing direction if client chooses.
